title: Add three new songs to the top of the music page

requirements.text: Add three new songs to the top of the track list on MusicPage.tsx, above all existing entries, as clickable Suno links in the same style as the existing tracks: 'Unbreakable Signal' (https://suno.com/s/owSmEgAmBXYqVuZt), 'Tasten - din venn eller fiende?' (https://suno.com/s/TiV9L1eSJsCOdCCs), 'Caffeine A.I. Code Rush' (https://suno.com/s/BldXyW2xM1nW1C4U).

quotes: oppdater musikksiden med disse nye sangene øverst
bare legg til lenkene øverst i listen i samme stil

acceptanceCriteria: The three new songs appear at the very top of the track list on the music page, before any existing songs.
Each new song is rendered as a clickable link using the MusicTrackCard component (or equivalent existing style).
Clicking 'Tasten - din venn eller fiende?' navigates to https://suno.com/s/TiV9L1eSJsCOdCCs.
Clicking 'Caffeine A.I. Code Rush' navigates to https://suno.com/s/BldXyW2xM1nW1C4U.
The new entries visually match the style of the existing song entries on the page.

constraints: Do not change the visual style or layout of the music page beyond adding the new tracks.
Do not modify any backend files.
nonGoals: Embedding a Suno audio player on the page.
Adding album art or metadata beyond the track title and link.
Modifying any other page or component outside MusicPage.tsx and MusicTrackCard.tsx.
